com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.core.solver

Class QuantifierEliminatorForIndexFreeBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.core.solver.QuantifierEliminationProblemWrapper
      • com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.core.solver.QuantifierEliminationForIndexFreeBody
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QuantifierEliminationProblem

    public class QuantifierEliminatorForIndexFreeBody
extends QuantifierEliminationProblemWrapper
    Eliminates a quantifier when the body does not contain the index by doing one of two things:
    • if the group is idempotent, simplify to if condition for satisfiability of constraint then body else group's identity.
    • if the group is not idempotent, applies AssociativeCommutativeGroup.addNTimes(Expression, Expression, Context) to the literal-free body and SingleVariableConstraint.modelCount(Context), followed by Theory.simplify(Expression, Context).
    Author:
    braz
